intro: Memecylon celebicum, commonly known as the Celebes memecylon, is a small to medium-sized evergreen tree native to the Moluccas and parts of Indonesia. It belongs to the family Melastomataceae and is characterized by its elliptical leaves that are usually glossy and dark green. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pink, followed by bright red berries that are attractive to birds. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland to montane rainforests. Due to its ornamental value and ecological importance, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
